Name: Anchor Point Food Pantry (APFP)
Description: Hours: Mondays 4:00pm to 6:00pm At Great Land Worship Center behind Chapman School.  A hot meal is serve.  We serve 25 - 40 families per week.

Description:
Abbott Loop Community Church provides Food, Shelter and clothing to those in need within the community.They are located at the intersection of Abbott Road and Lake Otis Parkway. Please contact them for more information.

Name: Anchorage City Church - Food Shelf
Description: The Anchorage City Church - Food Shelf services residents in need of food assistance. Hours:The Second Saturday of every month 8:00am - 12:00pmResidents seeking assistance will need to bring photo Ids for all family members effected. They are located on 100th Avenue off of Minnesota Drive. Please contact them directly for more detailed program information.

Name: Fellowship In Serving Humanity
Description:
Service description:Fellowship in Serving Humanity (FISH) is an all-volunteer program that delivers an emergency three day supply of food per family member.
Fees:No Fee for Service
Intake.You must call between 8:00am - 9:00am, Monday, Wednesday and Friday to be put on the list for deliveries. The list fills quickly, so the closer you call to 8am the better your chances will be.

We can accept drivers license, state ID, birth certificate, CIB card, Denali Kid Care, military ID, passport, etc. We can NOT accept a social security card.

Provides emergency food assistance to those in need.
